mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId , s.store_id AS storeId , f.folder_id AS folderId , r.user_nickname AS userNickname , f.folder_name AS folderName , s.store_name AS storeName , s.store_category AS storeCategory , s.latitude , s.longitude , r.image1 , r.review_score AS reviewScore , r.review_content AS reviewContent , r.pay_date AS payDate FROM users u JOIN participants p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN folders f ON p.folder_id = f.folder_id JOIN folder_reviews fr ON f.folder_id = fr.folder_id JOIN ( SELECT r1.review_id , r1.store_id , u1.user_nickname , r1.image1 , r1.review_score , r1.review_content , r1.pay_date FROM reviews r1 JOIN users u1 ON u1.user_id = r1.user_id ) r ON fr.review_id = r.review_id JOIN stores s ON r.store_id = s.store_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY r.review_id
